categories: Category:Imperial I-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Harpox was an Imperial I-class Star Destroyer serving the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War.

The Harpox was introduced in the 2008 reference title The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia. The 1994 video game Star Wars: TIE Fighter misspelt the Immobilizer 418 cruiser Harpax "Harpox." The accompanying TIE Fighter Collector's CD-ROM: The Official Strategy Guide made the same error.
